Package paint

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PickListener
    A listener to color picking events in a PaintCanvas.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BetterRectangle
    A more efficient rectangle shape that can handle negative dimensions.
    Paint  
    PaintCanvas
    A canvas specially made for user drawing and image displaying.
    PaintToolbar
    A toolbar designed for interacting with a PaintCanvas.
    SelectionRectangle
    A rectangle designed for selection content as an image in its parent.
    SmartSaveAlert
    A standard alert box asking for saving before continuing.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PaintCanvas.Mode
    PaintCanvas interaction modes.
    PaintCanvas.Pen
    PaintCanvas Pen for drawings.
